document_data.mainbody: '''''Elemental aura''''' was a powerful [[abjuration]] and [[evocation]] spell that protected the caster against one specific element designated during casting and provided certain powers related to the element. This aura moved with the caster.

Effect.Air: An [[air]] ''aura'' protected the recipient against dangerous [[:Category:Gases|gases]] and air attacks as well as [[Protection from normal missiles|attacks from non-magical missile weapons]], and kept creatures from the [[Elemental Plane of Air]] at bay. It also provided the ability to ''[[fly]]''. An air ''aura'' was whitish in color.
Effect.Earth: An [[Earth (element)|earth]] ''aura'' protected the recipient against the attacks from non-magical metal- or stone-[[weapon]]s, and kept creatures from the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]] at bay. It also allowed one to move comfortably through earth, and create a ''[[wall of stone]]''. An earth ''aura'' was grayish in color.
Effect.Fire: A [[fire]] ''aura'' protected the recipient against fire, both mundane and magical, and kept creatures from the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]] at bay. It also allowed one to move comfortably through fire, and create a ''[[wall of fire]]''. A fire ''aura'' was reddish in color.
Effect.Water: A [[water]] ''aura'' protected the recipient against attacks using cold or water, and kept creatures from the [[Elemental Plane of Water]] at bay. It also allowed one to move comfortably through water, and create a ''[[wall of ice]]''. A water ''aura'' was blueish in color.
Effect.Wood: [[Wu jen]] from [[Kara-Tur]], based on their different world view, knew of a [[wood]] ''aura''. It protected the recipient against weapons made of wood, as well as against plants. It also allowed one to [[pass without trace|move comfortably through vegetation]], ''[[speak with plants]]'', and heal wounds while having access to soil, sun and water.

document_data.Components: This spell required verbal components only.
document_data.History: This spell was not of [[Netherese]] origin.<ref> In [[Zakhara]], ''elemental aura'' was known but not common in the magical community by [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref>
document_data.Users:
Employed by elementalists, and, more rarely, generalist wizards, ''elemental aura'' was also granted to the most powerful ''[[sonnlinor]]'' ([[priest]]s of [[Moradin]]).<ref>

The mysterious [[sea mage]] from [[Huzuz]] known as the [[White Agate]] was known to use ''elemental aura''.<ref>
